data.text:
@cobuspienaar  

When the user has put in the case number and court, the system should check and see if the case number and court have been verified in the past. If so, it should pop up a window and state the the case has been previously captured and provide details of the case. At this point the user should have the option of placing the current case on hold or continue to capture it.

If they place it on hold, then it should be given a specific reason called 'Capturer On Hold Duplicate' so that they can be reference at a later stage.

The reason they have the option to continue is because they may get a rescission and the previous case was the judgment. Or they are working on an extract from one court to another etc.
